entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
